keys: ötvösség,  617 előtt,  Theodelinda koronája,  Theodelinda,  Agilulf lombard király,  Monzai dóm,

kunst des Goldschmieds, vor 617, Krone Theodolinas, 
Theodolina, Agilulf Lombard König, Kathedrale von Monza

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aec-f7a4-40ef-2a06-0c66595cbb14#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Theodelinda koronája.</string>
            <string language="en">Theodelinda's Crown</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krone Theodelindas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Couronne de Theodelinda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coroa De Theodelinda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parte superiore Del Theodelinda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κορώνα Theodelinda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corona De Theodelinda</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">abroncskorona, fehér és kék, foglalatos ékkövekkel.</string>
            <string language="en">Band crown, white and blue, with socketed precious strones</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ötvösség,  617 előtt,  Theodelinda koronája,  Theodelinda,  Agilulf lombard király,  Monzai dóm,  </string>
            <string language="en">goldsmith's art, before 617, Theodolina's Crown, Theodolina, Agilulf Lombard King, Cathedral of Monza</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Versehen Sie Krone mit einem Band, weiß und 
blau, mit socketed kostbaren strones</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réunissez la couronne, blanc et bleu, avec les 
strones précieux connectables</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Una a coroa, branco e azul, com strones preciosos
socketed</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Leghi la parte superiore, bianco e blu, con gli 
strones preziosi socketed</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κορώνα ζωνών, άσπρος και μπλε, με τα πολύτιμα 
strones</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Congriegue la corona, blanco y azul, con los 
strones preciosos socketed</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst des Goldschmieds, vor 617, Krone Theodolinas, 
Theodolina, Agilulf Lombard König, Kathedrale von Monza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'art de l'orfèvre, avant 617, la couronne de 
Theodolina, Theodolina, roi d'Agilulf Lombard, cathédrale de Monza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte do goldsmith, antes de 617, coroa de Theodolina, 
Theodolina, rei de Agilulf Lombard, catedral de Monza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte dell'orafo, prima di 617, parte superiore del 
Theodolina, Theodolina, re di Agilulf Lombard, cattedrale di Monza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τέχνη χρυσοχόου, πριν από 617, κορώνα Theodolina, 
Theodolina, Agilulf lombard βασιλιάς, καθεδρικός ναός 
Monza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte del orfebre, antes de 617, corona de Theodolina, 
Theodolina, rey de Agilulf Lombard, catedral de Monza</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
